name: Super Admin
description: The Super Admin role retains its high-level privileges for system management and configuration. This role is typically assigned to the application's superusers or administrators

name: Super Admin NCDF
description: The NCDF Super Admin role retains its high-level privileges for ncdf management and configuration.

name: NcdNCDFf Access
description: The NCDF accessn role determines who access ncdf portal

name: Super Admin E-Market
description: The E-Market Super Admin role retains its high-level privileges for e-market management and configuration.

name: E-Market Access
description: The E-Market accessn role determines who access e-market portal
